title: ccmp
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023060548/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Technical Info](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023060548/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Technical%20Info) : [Feature Tags](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023060548/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Feature%20Tags) : ccmp**

'ccmp' is an [OpenType](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023060548/http:/typophile.com/wiki/OpenType) [feature tag](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023060548/http:/typophile.com/wiki/feature%20tag) with the friendly name "Glyph Composition/Decomposition". [Click here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023060548/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/features_ae.htm#ccmp) to read the spec from the Microsoft Layout Tag Registry.
